rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space with a wheelchair-accessible ramp and wide doorways designed to adhere to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Living Room & Dining Area
rooms.description: An art deco styled open-plan area that flows into the dining space. Windows placed for optimal natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace with ergonomic design features and accessibility in mind. The location is chosen per Vastu guidelines to bring positive energy.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A functional kitchen integrated into the living space with wheelchair-accessible counters and storage adhering to local norms.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Primary bedroom with sufficient space and a window for natural light. Designed in an art deco style with Vastu-aligned positioning.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A compact guest room designed to maintain privacy while following Vastu principles and accessibility standards.

rooms.name: Servants' Quarters
rooms.description: Dedicated living space for domestic staff, ensuring comfort and functionality with wheelchair-accessible design.

courtyard.name: Central Courtyard
courtyard.description: An open central courtyard that provides natural light, ventilation and a serene environment. It's wheelchair accessible and follows Vastu guidelines by aligning with the main entrance.
